name: Club (Cudgel)
description: A blunt instrument fashioned from wood or metal. Easily obtained from standing trees or through the use of an unloaded long gun such as a rifle or carbine (laser weapons are too delicate to be used as cudgels).

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Mace
description: A mace is a blunt weapon that has a weighted head. The haft of the mace is typically constructed of wood or metal with the head being constructed of stone, bone, copper, bronze, iron, or steel.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
